description: [FIN8](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0061) has used remote code execution to download subsequent payloads.(Citation: FireEye Fin8 May 2016)(Citation: Bitdefender FIN8 July 2021)

external_references.description: Kizhakkinan, D., et al. (2016, May 11). Threat Actor Leverages Windows Zero-day Exploit in Payment Card Data Attacks. Retrieved February 12, 2018.
Martin Zugec. (2021, July 27). Deep Dive Into a FIN8 Attack - A Forensic Investigation. Retrieved September 1, 2021.
